Sweet Stocking stuffer, Christmas gift Great chemistry gift Amazing science gift The Facts Gold (atomic number 79) this sample is ideal for element collectors on the cheap or those conducting experiments. Gold is a metallic transition metal Gold is a soft, ductile, malleable, lustrous metal with high electrical and thermal conductivity. Gold has been used for thousands of years and predates written history. Nearly all of the gold on Earth came from meteorites that bombarded the planet over 200 million years after it formed. Gold is a noble metal. It is relatively unreactive and resists degradation by air, moisture, or acidic conditions. While acids dissolve most metals, a special mixture of acids called aqua regia is used to dissolve gold. This is high quality yet cheap affordable Gold Safety / Caution Keep out of reach from children! Do not ingest Gold is considered to be non-toxic
